welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tadaoka-higashi, a charming city known for its rich history and breathtaking natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and agree to the terms and conditions to access.
